author: C. Wu

review: Initially, I wasn't sure if the Amazon Fire TV Stick would be worth purchasing but when it went on sale for $24.99, I had to at least try it. The set-up was surprisingly quick and simple. The menu/interface was also easy to navigate through using the supplied remote. While the Amazon Fire TV Stick can be controlled using a mobile app, I love having the remote as an additional option. Also, the specs of this product exceed that of its competitors'. With its dual-core processor and 8GB of storage, I have yet to experience any lag or connectivity issues. One minor con is that I had to connect an Amazon account with a linked credit/debit card before I could download any FREE apps but other than that, this product is amazing. The streaming quality is very clear and I love that I am able to screen mirror my device to the TV. The Amazon Fire TV Stick is a great product that offers awesome app/streaming features without the need of a Smart TV or gaming console.
